start: ^The castle was under attack, <color=#F8FF30>the princess was in danger</color>, and soon darkness would engulf the entire kingdom. A call for help had been sent.
^Our prince wants to help; he has gathered a troop. On the way, they were attacked, and our hero was left alone. Will he have to deal with this all by himself?!
^They say, “Even one man can change the course of the future.” Well, it's time to find out the truth.
